thread.title: We're Obsessed with the Full-Length Jessica Jones Trailer
thread.title_full: We're Obsessed with the Full-Length Jessica Jones Trailer

author: TV Guide
title: We're Obsessed with the Full-Length Jessica Jones Trailer
text: We're Obsessed with the Full-Length Jessica Jones Trailer Based on the newly released trailer, Netflix's latest Marvel series Jessica Jones takes everything we love about ... Comment   TV Guide Posted Oct. 23, 2015 at 12:08 PM Updated at 3:19 PM Posted Oct. 23, 2015 at 12:08 PM Updated at 3:19 PM Based on the newly released trailer, Netflix's latest Marvel series Jessica Jones takes everything we love about Daredevil and kicks it up a notch. As the series starts, Jessica Jones ( Krysten Ritter ) is attempting to rebuild her life - albeit a drunken, isolated life as a P.I. - when her past comes back to torment her in the form of Killgrave ( David Tennant ), who psychologically tortured and controlled her for months. Jessica is forced to confront her own PTSD from her previous relationship with Killgrave in order to track him down and face him in the present. Let's just say, things get dark. Fast. In addition to diving deep into the Jessica Jones mythology, the noir drama will also introduce Mike Colter as Luke Cage, who will be spinning off into his own Netflix series soon. Jessica Jones premieres Friday, Nov. 20 on Netflix. Other Links From TVGuide.com
